attributes.action: Bring MPs penisons,  pay and conditions into line with police and armed forces
attributes.additional_details: Parliament is carrying out the most savage attack on police and armed forces penisons, pay and conditions in generations .Parliament claims that "We are all in this together" but MPs show no sign of  personally accepting the burden of the cuts that all others are having to endure, most off all those who keep the public and our nation safe. Members of parliament should therefore make a similar sacrifce, by accepting for themselves the same pay cuts, decline in conditions of service and reduction in pension rights presently being forced upon our police, soldiers, sailors and airmen.
